title: font id - looks like swift but not much
content:
hello,

i recently discovered store front typeface. it reminds me of gerard unger’s swift and peter bi’lak’s greta or brioni.  
it might be easier than i thought to be.  
could anyone help on this?  
thanks!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [J-ballet logo N.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20091204191529/http:/typophile.com/files/J-ballet%20logo%20N.PNG) | 14.45 KB |
author: duesiqn

comments.content: I think it’s [Sylfaen](http://web.archive.org/web/20091204191529/http:/www.ascendercorp.com/font/sylfaen/), a multi-language font that comes with Windows.
